page.title: 03Education
page.content: THE ONLY SCHOOL IN THE AREA IS THORNHILL SCHOOL THIS COVERS THE AREA FROM ST.THOMAS'S CROSS TO THE EAST AND NORTH OF THE AREA BUT THE CHILDREN FROM HAILE AND ST.THOMAS'S CROSS HAVE THE CHOICE OF GOING TO A NEARBY SCHOOL IN EGREMONT.IN THORNHILL SCHOOL THERE ARE 114 PUPILS,5 CLASS TEACHERS AND 3 ASSISTANT TEACHERS.THE ASSISTANT HELP CHILDREN WHO HAVE DIFFICULTIES READING AND WRITING.THERE ARE A VARIETY OF AUDIO-VISUAL AIDS ,THERE ARE TWO TELEVISIONS,1 RADIO,2 RADIO CASSETTES AND A BBC MODEL B COMPUTER WITH DISC DRIVE AND CASSETTE.THE SCHOOL WAS OPENED IN 1926 AND MRS GIBSON IS THE HEADMISTRESS.THERE IS A PLAYGROUP,A LIBRARY,A NURSERY AND P.E. AND SPORTS FACILITES.DINNER'S COST Â£2.50 FOR 5 DINNERS(50p EACH).THERE ARE 3 DINNER LADIES AND 3 DINNER SERVERS.
